traveling and making friends is something i find delightful.

participant_2.background:
I want a home where I can have my own music studio and a big backyard for my family to play baseball in.
I sometimes spend hours practicing bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it.
I need the energy of the city to fuel my never-ending work.
I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
I am always learning new things and trying to improve my skills, but I am not always confident in my abilities.

content.text: Hi there, I'm in the market for a new home.  What's your dream home like?
Hello!  I'm glad you asked.  I dream of having a home with a large backyard for my family to play baseball in.  I also want to have my own music studio.
That sounds really nice.  I enjoy spending time with my family too, so I can see why you'd want a big backyard.  What do you like to do in your music studio?
I like to practice singing and playing guitar.  I'm always trying to improve my skills.  Sometimes I spend hours practicing bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it.
That's really interesting.  I've never heard of anyone practicing bird calls before.  What made you start doing that?
I don't know.  I guess I just like the sound of birds singing.  I think it's beautiful.
I agree, birds singing is beautiful.  I love listening to them outside on a summer day.  I'm glad you found something you enjoy doing.
Thanks!  I'm glad too.  It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I'm sure it is.  I'm going to go look for some bird calls on YouTube now.  I'm curious to hear what they sound like.
You should!  I think you'll like them.
